thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Stock Slides Likely Making Bank of Japan More Cautious About Rates

author: Megumi Fujikawa
title: Stock Slides Likely Making Bank of Japan More Cautious About Rates

organizations.name: stock slides likely making bank of japan

text:
TOKYO—The Bank of Japan is likely more cautious about changing monetary policy after stocks plunged this week, an adviser to Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said, as he called on the bank to keep supporting the economy aggressively.
“If Japan rushes to exit from monetary easing, after this big turmoil, it could be swallowed in a wave of global stock falls,” Koichi Hamada, one of the architects of Abenomics, said in an interview with The Wall Street Journal.
...
